title: Anamadheya Ashok Kumar
overview: While interviewing a retired senior lawyer at his house, investigative journalist Praveen Rajashekhar hears a commotion upstairs. Concerned, he rushes to check and is attacked by an intruder. In self-defense, he stabs the attacker and calls the police, only to find himself as the prime suspect. Is he a criminal, a witness, or a victim?
